ygData.subject: Re: Strategies and qeusts
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Vrathus Sorry i couldnt chat with you longer the other week when you sent me a tell. I think i was getting smacked around by something :) Anyway: heres
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Vrathus

Sorry i couldnt chat with you longer the other week
when you sent me a tell. I think i was getting smacked
around by something :)

Anyway: heres the Bathory history to date.

Currently level 33. A very looong 33. This is my first
and only character. I just dont do lots of XP camping.
I take many breaks from that and try quests and a
little adventuring. Which always equals little to no
XP. But is more fun.

I am realatively untwinked. The only things i got that
i didnt go get is some bronze armor. Which i didnt get
until early 20s, which is the appropriate level for
that type of armor anyway.

Weapon history:
For the first 8 levels or so, i used either a rusty
battle axe or rusty 2H sword, that i got off of a
decaying skelton.

Then i bought my mino axe. A mino for 8Pp at that time
was a deal.

I used this until level 19 with a shiny brass shield.
During my Befallen days i was switching off using a
Teticle whip which i got for 15Pp for those magic only
MOBs. During this time i tried for the BBC. Killed the
Troll SK, but just wasnt lucky enough to get one.
But a guildmate was able to aquire one from that
stingy troll and gave it to me. (I dont consider that
twinking since i killed him, i just wasnt lucky).

So now at 19 i have a BBC. Minus 8 AGI you say? Thats
where having a friend who does jeweling come in. Just
boosted the AGI back up with rings and such and i was
good to go.

Stayed with the BBC until about level 30. Then i went
into runny eye to get my BIBS. Realistically i could
have gone in there at around level 25. But i had a
heck of a time getting a group i could trust to go in
there and help me with it.

So thats where i stand now.

At level 20 i was offered a DR as a gift. I turned it
down becasue that was one of the items i wanted to go
get myself. But, now that i know you have to be 40ish
to even have a shot at getting it, and on top of that,
its only a damage 20 weapon, it doesnt seem worth the
wait. The DR is good for level 30 to 40 i would say.
By the time i can go get it, it will be obsolete. So i
have a feeling i will be a DR twink soon :)

There are other nice swords to consider, but havent
had a chance to get yet

Fleshripper: Nice weapon. But has a potentially
dangerous area effect spell to it. So you wont want to
use it all the time. Now that i have a Box of Aku Bar
though (pulled it off a specter myself) carry extra
weapons is no longer an issue.

Mithril 2H. Sweet weapon. But its in Sol B somewhere
(i Think). No group i can assemble would last in there
though.



Well, thats it for my weapons.

I have too much quest stuff to talk about so will just
do a different post.

Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule
